elements.text:
The cos() function returns the cosine of a given
angle. Angles in Picotron are measured as a
range of 0.0-1.0 counter-clockwise around a unit
circle, 0.0 being to the right.

A way to think about it:
  cos() returns the 'x'-axis component of
 an angle on a unit circle.
NOTE: unlike sin(), cos() is not inverted.
